statements: SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT property_name, revenue FROM financial_reports WHERE expenses > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT property_name, revenue, expenses FROM financial_reports WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT property_name, date, revenue FROM financial_reports WHERE property_name LIKE '%Hotel%';
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT property_name, revenue FROM financial_reports WHERE expenses > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_reports
SELECT property_name, expenses FROM financial_reports WHERE property_name LIKE '%Hotel%' ORDER BY expenses ASC
SELECT report_id, date, revenue - expenses AS net_profit FROM financial_reports WHERE revenue > expenses
SELECT * FROM FinancialReport;
SELECT report_date, revenue FROM FinancialReport WHERE property_id = 10;
SELECT property_name, address FROM PropertyDetails WHERE year_built > 2000;
SELECT property_id, revenue, expenses FROM FinancialReport ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM PropertyDetails WHERE property_value > 100000;
SELECT * FROM FinancialReport WHERE property_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT report_id, property_id, report_date FROM FinancialReport WHERE property_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND expenses > 1000 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT property_name, address, property_value, year_built FROM PropertyDetails WHERE year_built > 2000 AND property_value > 500000 ORDER BY property_value DESC, property_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM FinancialReport WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM FinancialReport fr JOIN PropertyDetails pd ON fr.property_id = pd.property_id WHERE fr.expenses > pd.property_value ORDER BY fr.property_id ASC, pd.property_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, address, city, state FROM properties WHERE property_type='House';
SELECT * FROM financial_records WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM reports WHERE is_approved=true;
SELECT property_name, city, country FROM properties ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_name, city FROM properties WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT property_name, address, state FROM properties WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM financial_records WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, report_date FROM properties JOIN reports ON properties.property_id = reports.property_id WHERE reports.report_type = 'Monthly' AND reports.is_approved = true;
SELECT * FROM property;
SELECT id, name, address FROM property ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental WHERE rent > 1000;
SELECT tenant_name, rent FROM rental WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT sum(amount) FROM expense WHERE category = 'Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM property
SELECT id, name, address FROM property ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT SUM(value) AS total_value FROM property
SELECT p.name, r.tenant_name FROM property p INNER JOIN rental r ON p.id = r.property_id
SELECT p.name, i.source, i.amount FROM property p INNER JOIN income i ON p.id = i.property_id WHERE i.amount > 1000 ORDER BY i.amount DESC
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM properties ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(property_value) AS average_value FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM properties WHERE property_value > 5000;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY property_value DESC;

SELECT tenant_name, tenant_contact, property_name FROM tenants JOIN properties ON tenants.property_id = properties.property_id WHERE properties.property_type = 'House' AND tenants.tenant_email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT lease_id, tenant_name, lease_start_date, lease_end_date FROM leases JOIN tenants ON leases.tenant_id = tenants.tenant_id WHERE lease_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND lease_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue, property_type FROM revenue JOIN properties ON revenue.property_id = properties.property_id GROUP BY property_type HAVING avg_revenue > 500;

SELECT SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses, property_name, expense_date FROM expenses JOIN properties ON expenses.property_id = properties.property_id GROUP BY property_name, expense_date ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
